sentences.english: He averages one pack of cigarettes a day.
sentences.chinese: 他均匀每日抽一包烟卷儿。

sentences.english: He smoked Prince Albert tobacco in cigarettes he rolled himself.
sentences.chinese: 他自己曾把阿尔伯特王子牌的烟草卷成烟卷儿吸。
